info.description: This is a REST API documentation for CARA ML Service of Inovalon Inc, risk adjustment module for Medicare Advantage and Affordable Care Act patients based on machine learning algorithms. You can find out more about Inovalon at [https://www.inovalon.com/](https://www.inovalon.com/).
info.title: CARAMLService

text/html.example:
Welcome to CARA ML Service !

Please POST your requests through /retrospective or /prospective with data as application/json. To try out API and view the documentation, please view /documentation.

post.description: Retrospectively perform risk adjustment based on one patient's past period of claims data (usually a year) and return confidence of gaps and corresponding supporting evidences.

Prospectively perform risk adjustment based on one patient's past period of claims data (usually a year) and target (current) period of claims data and return confidence of gaps and corresponding supporting evidences.

correlation_id.description: the ID for client developers debugging reference

lob.description: line of business to performance, only accept "MA" or "ACA"

threshold.description: the threhold of output confidence level (only return those HCCs with confidence greater than threshold)

get_indicators.description: if true, return top n indicators of claim codes that contribute the most to the HCC

top_indicators.description: number of indicators to output if get_indicators is true

correlation_id.description: the ID for client developers debugging reference

lob.description: line of business to performance, only accept "MA" or "ACA"

threshold.description: the threhold of output confidence level (only return those HCCs with confidence greater than threshold)

get_indicators.description: if true, return top n indicators of claim codes that contribute the most to the HCC

top_indicators.description: number of indicators to output if get_indicators is true

code_type.description: the claim type, only accept "ICD9", "ICD10", "CPT", "HCPCS", "NDC9", "ICD9Proc", "ICD10Proc" or "DRG"

items.description: the code under corresponding code type

lob.description: line of business to performance, only accept "MA" or "ACA"

confidence.description: the confidence level of gap based on machine learning (probability between 0 to 1); note that if the number is -1, that means this HCC is a "known condition", i.e. there are at least one ICD10 code directly indicating the HCC based on CMS/HHS model; if the number is exact 1.0 in prospective service, that means this HCC was a known condition in prior year, but not yet recorded in target year, still we know it is 100% confident the patient having this chronic condition.

indicators.description: top n indicators that contribute to the gap confidence; if it is a gap, n (number of array) depends on client's choice; if it is a known condition, the number of array can be all the codes directly indicating the HCC.

code.description: the claim code contribute to the gap with format "CodeType-Code".

contribution.description: the feature importance number of the code based on machine learning algorithm; if null, that means this claim code is directly indicating the HCC.

correlation_id.description: the ID for client developers debugging reference

oneOf: Bad request: either no input or not application/json type.
Bad request: line of business ("lob") must be either MA or ACA, got CMS instead.
Bad request: "code_type" must be one of "ICD9", "ICD10", "CPT", "HCPCS", "NDC9", "ICD9Proc", "ICD10Proc", "DRG", got ICD instead.
Bad request: please provide claim codes of prior period with key as "prior_year".

correlation_id.description: the ID for client developers debugging reference
